strapiPost.title: October Sales Tax Revenue
strapiPost.content:
October 2020 sales tax showed mixed results for the region.

  • Info - The cities of Rogers and Bentonville showed drops in revenue generation, while Fayetteville and Springdale showed increases from the year before.
  • Rogers - Rogers reported about $1.67 million in revenue from the city's 1% sales tax in October, a decline of 4.38% from the $1.75 million the city received in the same month in 2019.
  • Bentonville - Bentonville got about $1.43 million in sales tax revenue in October, down by 17.23% from the $1.73 million received in the same month in 2019.
  • Fayetteville - Fayetteville saw an increase in sales tax revenue of about 8.1%, receiving about $2.18 million in October compared to about $2 million in October 2019.
  • Springdale - Springdale reported an increase of about 4.5%, receiving about $1.48 million in October compared to about $1.42 million in October 2019.

NWA Democrat Gazzette
